jobDescription: The Senior Data Analyst is a member of the business intelligence team and at a top level is responsible for setup, data processing, transformation and reporting to facilitate collection, maintenance and organization of knowledge effectively in the organization and with it's partners. This is a great opportunity for a smart, technology-savvy, numbers / data-oriented individual. This is a vital role to the success of the business.Responsibilities include:•Quantitative analysis of complex business issues to support management decisions•Ongoing report generation, analysis, and review of critical marketplace metrics•Crafting and presenting findings from reporting and analysis to management•Execution of analytical and operational special projects, as they arise Technical KnowledgeRequirements:•Microsoft SQL or MySQL –Experience with writing trigger and stored procedures•Advanced expertise in Microsoft Excel –Pivot table, formulas and VBA experience •Microsoft Access Optional Preferred experience:•Experience with advertising systems such as: –CoreMedia Systems, Donovan Data Systems, Strata, Google Adwords, Nielsen•Programming experience in C#•Experience with reporting systems such as Tableau or Qlikview•Experience with setting up surveys with Usamp or SurveyMonkey
